settings.body: From patching up tears in your trusty jacket to darning holes in winter knits, our repairs team are here to help. Common repairs such as single jacket patches or a wash & reproof cost £20 and include shipping to and from our repairs workshop in Cornwall. If you have a very well-loved jacket, our Full Service at £125 will repair any tears, damaged pockets, worn out hems and broken zip, alongside a full wash & reproof ready for many more years of adventures together.

No two repairs are alike, and as all repairs are carried out by hand, please be aware repairs take an average of 3 - 6 weeks. Please note our peak months are October to January.

FOR REPAIRS QUERIES PLEASE CONTACT: 

repairs@finisterre.com

As with all Finisterre products, a lot of attention and care has gone into making our wetsuits; seams, neoprene, construction and fit.

We warranty all seams and neoprene against defects in manufacturing and materials for one year from purchase. Within this time, we are happy to offer a free repairs service carried out by a local expert wetsuit repairer. 

As we like to make sure all repairs are finished to the highest level, these repairs can take 3-4 weeks. To arrange a wetsuit repair please contact us hello@finisterre.com.
